languages.text: "К сожалению, согласно Марсианскому соглашению они имеют полное право ограничивать доступ к своим владениям. В ответ на попытки нарушить их неприкосновенность, техножрецы имеют санкцию открыть огонь, а огневой потенциал их наземных батарей способен уничтожить целую эскадру. Столкновение с ними... не рекомендовано".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, к сожалению, они имеют полное право ограничивать доступ к своим территориям, согласно Марсианскому соглашению. В ответ на попытки нарушить их неприкосновенность, техножрецы имеют право открыть огонь из нова-пушек, способных создавать черные дыры, пожирающие целые флотилии. Столкновение с ними... не рекомендовано".

languages.text: "Unfortunately, the Treaty of Mars gives them the right to restrict access to their domain. Should someone attempt to violate their sanctuary, the Tech-Priests are authorised to open fire, and the firepower of their ground batteries is capable of destroying an entire squadron. Initiating a confrontation is... not advisable."
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, согласно Марсианскому соглашению они имеют полное право ограничивать доступ к своим владениям. В ответ на попытки нарушить их неприкосновенность, техножрецы имеют санкцию открыть огонь, а огневой потенциал их наземных батарей способен уничтожить целую эскадру. Столкновение с ними... не рекомендовано".

traits.locale_text: "Unfortunately, the Treaty of Mars gives them the right to restrict access to their domain. Should someone attempt to violate their sanctuary, the Tech-Priests are authorized to open fire, and the firepower of their ground batteries is capable of destroying an entire squadron. Initiating a confrontation is... not advisable."

"Unfortunately, the Treaty of Mars gives them the right to restrict access to their domain. Should someone attempt to violate their sanctuary, the Tech-Priests are authorized to open fire, and the firepower of their ground batteries is capable of destroying an entire squadron. Initiating a confrontation is... not advisable."

"Unfortunately, the Treaty of Mars gives them the right to restrict access to their domain. Should someone attempt to violate their sanctuary, the Tech-Priests are authorized to open fire, and the firepower of their ground batteries is capable of destroying an entire squadron. Initiating a confrontation is... not advisable."

"Unfortunately, the Treaty of Mars gives them the right to restrict access to their domain. Should someone attempt to violate their sanctuary, the Tech-Priests are authorised to open fire, and the firepower of their ground batteries is capable of destroying an entire squadron. Initiating a confrontation is... not advisable."

"Unfortunately, the Treaty of Mars gives them the right to restrict access to their domain. Should someone attempt to violate their sanctuary, the Tech-Priests are authorised to open fire, and the firepower of their ground batteries is capable of destroying an entire squadron. Initiating a confrontation is... not advisable."

languages.text: « Malheureusement, le traité de Mars leur assure le droit de restreindre tout accès à leur domaine. Si quelqu'un venait à violer leur sanctuaire, les technoprêtres sont autorisés à ouvrir le feu, leur artillerie au sol étant suffisamment puissante pour oblitérer un escadron entier. De fait, déclencher les hostilités est... fortement déconseillé. »
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the Treaty of Mars gives them the right to restrict access to their domain. Should someone attempt to violate their sanctuary, the Tech-Priests are authorised to open fire, and the firepower of their ground batteries is capable of destroying an entire squadron. Initiating a confrontation is... not advisable."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, le traité de Mars leur assure le droit de restreindre tout accès à leur domaine. Si quelqu'un venait à violer leur sanctuaire, les technoprêtres sont autorisés à ouvrir le feu, leur artillerie au sol étant suffisamment puissante pour oblitérer un escadron entier. De fait, déclencher les hostilités est... fortement déconseillé. »

languages.text: “很遗憾，根据《火星条约》，他们有权禁止他人进入他们的领地。如果有人打算入侵他们的庇护所，那些技术神甫有权开火，他们强大的地面炮台足以摧毁整支中队。与他们发起冲突……恐怕并不可取。”
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the Treaty of Mars gives them the right to restrict access to their domain. Should someone attempt to violate their sanctuary, the Tech-Priests are authorised to open fire, and the firepower of their ground batteries is capable of destroying an entire squadron. Initiating a confrontation is... not advisable."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，根据《火星条约》，他们有权禁止他人进入他们的领地。如果有人打算入侵他们的庇护所，那些技术祭司有权开火，他们强大的地面炮台足以摧毁整支中队。与他们发起冲突……恐怕并不可取。”

languages.text: "Leider gewährt ihnen das Mars-Abkommen das Recht, den Zugang zu ihrem Reich einzuschränken. Sollte jemand versuchen, in ihr Heiligtum einzudringen, dürfen die Techpriester das Feuer eröffnen. Und die Feuerkraft ihrer Bodenbatterien reicht aus, um ein ganzes Geschwader auszulöschen. Eine Konfrontation zu beginnen, ist ... nicht ratsam."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the Treaty of Mars gives them the right to restrict access to their domain. Should someone attempt to violate their sanctuary, the Tech-Priests are authorised to open fire, and the firepower of their ground batteries is capable of destroying an entire squadron. Initiating a confrontation is... not advisable."

traits.locale_text: "Leider gewährt ihnen das Mars-Abkommen das Recht, den Zugang zu ihrem Reich einzuschränken. Sollte jemand versuchen, in ihr Heiligtum einzudringen, dürfen die Techpriester das Feuer eröffnen. Und die Feuerkraft ihrer Bodenbatterien reicht aus, um ein ganzes Geschwader auszulöschen. Eine Konfrontation zu beginnen, ist ... nicht ratsam."

languages.text: «Por desgracia, el tratado de Marte les da derecho a restringir el acceso a su dominio. Si alguien intentase acceder a su santuario, los tecnosacerdotes están autorizados a disparar, y son capaces de destruir a un escuadrón entero con la potencia de sus baterías terrestres. No le recomiendo provocar un enfrentamiento...».
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the Treaty of Mars gives them the right to restrict access to their domain. Should someone attempt to violate their sanctuary, the Tech-Priests are authorised to open fire, and the firepower of their ground batteries is capable of destroying an entire squadron. Initiating a confrontation is... not advisable."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, el tratado de Marte les da derecho a restringir el acceso a su dominio. Si alguien intentase acceder a su santuario, los tecnosacerdotes están autorizados a disparar, y son capaces de destruir a un escuadrón entero con la potencia de sus baterías terrestres. No le recomiendo provocar un enfrentamiento...».

languages.text: 「恐縮ですが、火星条約で彼らは領土に訪れる者を制限する権利があります。聖域に押し入る者がいれば、技術司祭は攻撃する権限を持ち、そのうえ彼らの地上バッテリーの火力は、戦隊を丸ごと壊滅できる威力です。対立を生むことは…お勧めできません」
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the Treaty of Mars gives them the right to restrict access to their domain. Should someone attempt to violate their sanctuary, the Tech-Priests are authorised to open fire, and the firepower of their ground batteries is capable of destroying an entire squadron. Initiating a confrontation is... not advisable."

traits.locale_text: 「恐縮ですが、火星条約で彼らは領土に訪れる者を制限する権利があります。聖域に押し入る者がいれば、技術司祭は攻撃する権限を持ち、そのうえ彼らの地上バッテリーの火力は、戦隊を丸ごと壊滅できる威力です。対立を生むことは…お勧めできません」
